title: S15 Ep1: Supernatural News/Parashare: Dave Loses It Edition

description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS kicks off 2020 in style with the Dave Loses It Edition, Strange Supernatural News & YOUR Stories of Real Paranormal Encounters!

Dave is back with his Predictions for 2020, a visit with Rowlf the Dog, Satan and plenty of songs, weirdness, Alien Sex, Skynet has launced creepy drones, skin crawling stories, that will leave you twitching and sleeping with pantyhose over your head for the future.

Get NEW Paranormal Swag, Books and other cool items here & help support the show: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

Support our sponsors for great deals!

Are you playing along with Beyond the Darkness on the Podcast One/ Betonline.AG Sportsnet Challenge?! Each Week Dave and Tim are picking the winners of five NFL gam,es and playing against the hosts of different Podcast One shows! If you play aloing with Dave and Tim on BetOnline.AG, and they win the week, you qualify to be one of five winners splitting a $500 weekly prize! To sign up go to https://promotions.betonline.ag/podcastone
